Articles.Content: So I have finally started playing with cross-feeding fuel lines, and OH WOW does it do the trick. I have been looking for mod payloads for me to carry to orbit, to the moon, ect. but Google has not turned up much. can you help me out?

I can send you my lander, if you\'d like to try it. It\'s fairly small, but very effective. The only thing is that it needs a kicker stage to slow it down from Mun orbit velocity; otherwise you might run out of fuel before you can return.
